title: A Thanksgiving NBA Mailbag! | Group Chat
description:
The ‘Group Chat’ crew answers questions from you, the listeners! Topics include: the biggest “pretender” team, help for Luka Doncic and the Dallas Mavericks, the 25-and-under power ranking, realistic midseason trades, and more.

Host: Justin Verrier
Guest: Jonathan Tjarks

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
